text: Waseda Shibuya Senior High School (Japanese: 早稲田大学系属早稲田渋谷シンガポール校) is a Japanese private school in West Coast, Singapore."Mission and School Philosophy." (Archive) Waseda Shibuya Senior High School in Singapore. Retrieved on 8 January 2014. It is affiliated with Waseda University in Tokyo, so students graduated from here can enter Waseda University. This school accepts graduates of Japanese junior high schools from other Asian regions."2013 Brochure ." () Waseda Shibuya Senior High School in Singapore. p. 23. Retrieved on 8 January 2014. == References == == Further reading == * 桑原 汎 and 松本 卓. "シンガポールに生きる(38)現地高校に国際人養成の夢を託して--早稲田渋谷シンガポール校事務局長 桑原汎さん." シンガポール 2003(1), 20-24, 2003-03. 日本シンガポール協会. See profile at CiNii. Category:20th-century establishments in Singapore Category:1991 establishments in Asia Category:Schools in Singapore Category:Waseda University
title: Waseda Shibuya Senior High School
